Articles.Content:
Requires Advanced Radial Nacelle Engine:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/advanced-radial-nacelle-engine/

And Lazor system:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/lazor-system/

NOTE:

Don't put it over 3rd throttle or it'll literally collapse in on itself. You may want to use Hyperedit too. Also, to fly it properly you need to select control from here on the Remote Guidance Unit by the RCS Tanks and turn on Lazor system

Voyager in action!

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=148780204

VAB:

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=148780324

Link:

http://www./download/0acx8kmv9ecsb33/USS+Voyager.craft

Edited May 29, 2013 by henryheyhey123
We need more pictures, my friend! It is good to showcase the entirety of your replica craft, especially one from the Fleet (seeing as Star Trek has an incredibly large fanbase )
